topic_name: Electric Potential Energy and Potential Due to a Point Charge

mcqs.question: Question 1 related to Electric Potential Energy and Potential Due to a Point Charge
mcqs.explanation: This question tests understanding of Define electric potential at a point in terms of the work done in bringing unit positive charge from infinity to that point
mcqs.learning_outcome: Define electric potential at a point in terms of the work done in bringing unit positive charge from infinity to that point
